articles.description: ARGENTINA 2-1 AUSTRALIA - OLIVER HOLT AT AHMAD BIN ALI STADIUM: Lionel Messi scored his first World Cup knockout goal to inspire Argentina past a dogged Australia side.
articles.content: The spirit of Pele, the footballing god who made so many of us fall in love with the game and who now lies desperately ill in the final days of his life at the Albert Einstein Hospital in Sao Paulo, … [+10007 chars]
